column1: Local Foods////i've sampled a variety of the sandwiches here and my favorite is the truffled egg salad-where has this sandwich been all my life?!? the pairing of truffles with egg salad is superb
column2: and the pretzel bun adds the perfect amount of saltiness to the equation.  the house smoked salmon is good
column3: but it's a tad bit heavy with the cream cheese.  they used to have a duck sandwich with cranberry jam that tasted like Thanksgiving... hopefully they'll bring that back to the menu. the sides are all good
column4: but my favorite is definitely the kale salad.
